Name: Benji's
Review Text:
Went there on a Saturday afternoon and we managed to find a table online immediately.
Interior is very interesting and the atmosphere is very cozy. Coffee and food ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: An underwhelming experience - photogenic dishes, but not tasty! The atmosphere and decorations are pleasant for laid-back work, but the kitchen and waiting staff was disappointing. The Buddha bowl I ordered was extremely bland and dry ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Just great food, with variety. The place was a bit crowded on Saturday, but we were able to find ourselves a nice place on the terrace. One of my favorite spots in Amsterdam for breakfast/lunch.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: The locations is quiet nice, looks really special with all the plants at the top of this room! The food is also okay but not sensational.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: The service has a lot to improve. They mixed up the tables (which we had booked in advance), and after 15 minutes, we sorted out. When we sat, the napkins on the table had been used by the previous customer, but the waitress changed when we ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: I greatly enjoyed the food and a satisfying variety of options for a brunch. As a brunch destination, I was let down by the fact that Mimosa was not available at 11:30am as they‚Äôve ran out of fresh orange juice - at the beginning of a ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Very cute interior with fresh and delicious healthy food. The serving size is quite large which makes the price a very good deal!

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Not worth it. Delighting customers is not the priority. Staff is not professional and make you wait a long time. Setting is nice but seating is uncomfortable, I sat on these chairs enough during elementary school. ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: What a gorgeous place! We were very excited to go there for Saturday brunch and tried to repeatedly book a table, but the online system seemed to have all weekends blocked out. So we showed up at the restaurant and asked the lady at the bar ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Benji is a cozy place. They serve healthy and tasty dishes. They have both savory and sweet food. I also liked their juices. Staff is very nice and friendly.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Beautifully decorated. Good food. Service could be a bit more friendly/attentive.

Name: Benji's
Review Text:
Cozy Caf√© with lots of Healthy and good Breakfast or Brunch Choices.

Nice interior with plants, lots of light and ambient music. ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: I've been here many times with Amsterdam friends, as well as visiting family. It has a great atmosphere & the food is of a great quality. I nearly always have the Tropical bowl which has loads of toppings. I have also tried a couple of the other dishes and they've always been amazing. Can't recommend Benji's enough!

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Certainly one of the best Eggs Benedict I've had here in Amsterdam. The service is also fast good, and the people working here are very kind.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Slow service. Mess up with the order. So we got our food separately and the second dish hadn‚Äôt even arrived when I was already finished with mine. They took the drinks off the bill but it was still a bad experience. 3 stars just because the food was tasty. Also would be great to have gluten-free alternatives.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Love their coffee and juices. The smoked salmon and avocado is very yummy and service is usually very fast.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Nice service, really good cheesecake, but also the breakfast bun was good. My friend got lentil based burgers and they were really tasty! Next time might take those :) and price is also really fine. I'll surely come back!

Name: Benji's
Review Text:
Great potential but victim of it's ow  success.

Very nice people but a total lack of structure and efficiency. Avoid when busy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: A beautifully designed breakfast and lunch spot in Amsterdam East. The menu has various food options from Smoothie Bowls, over sandwiches, wraps and salads, fresh juices, tea and good coffee. The dishes look lovely. They have a big table in ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Hip caf√© with urban jungle vibe! The food was very tasty and a treat for the eyes as well. You might have to wait about 15 minutes for your order but it's worth it. The atmosphere and staff was lovely, would recommend for breakfast.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: A gorgeous hipster-chic interior with a lot of greens that we've discovered by chance but were so pleased we did. Thanks for the vegan-friendly options! Literally THE best smoothie bowls I've ever had. Not to forget the wraps that were ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Love the light in the place , and how it‚Äôs decorated. Really nice people work there. We came for lunch at 12 and there was no line still. But in an hour it was totally full and the line , so be aware :) also the food was super nice. Asian ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Beautiful interior and a nice terrace out front. The food is nice though pricey, which is to be expected for a place like this in Amsterdam. The food did take a bit too long to come out which explains the lack of the 5th star.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Lovely interior, decorated with many plants and lots of natural light coming in through the huge windows. Loved the atmosphere and would go again either for coffee or to study. If I would change one thing, though, that would be the carrot cake. It was pretty bad tasting and given its price and the small portion, I expected more.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Tuna melt roll is very much recommended. The hot sauce is second to none. Well done team. Update: They unfortunately replaced it with a Burger type tuna which is by far not a good idea.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Great open and cozy brunch place. Super busy and but super friendly service. Only the fresh juices cannot be changed. Will definatly go again!

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Just ate here for a second time.  Found the staff polite, positive and welcoming.  The Buddha salad was scrumptious.  The watermelon juice lovely. Fresh flowers on the table (in clean clear water).  Very pleasant atmosphere with lots of green, windows and light.  Clean establishment.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: A really great breakfast and brunch place with beautiful interior design. The juice is amazing and the Bali bowl is highly recommended.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: What a cool place. Don't think it's in a quite place in Amsterdam. The location may be but the place is quite full at an early Saturday. Nice menu - had the breakfast Yoghurt Granola and that was excellent. Good granola with Greek Yoghurt ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Delicious coffee and food. The only downside is long waiting time.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Really nice brunch options covering all the bases, delicious bread for the toast and the fluffiest scone. The staff was nice and we did not have to wait too much for our food, however it wasn't very crowded. The inside is really pretty with ‚Ä¶

Name: Benji's
Review Text: super delicious breakfast with portions on the larger side. we tried the eggs with salmon and a granola bowl together with the ginger lemon tea. great combination - fantastic! one of the best restaurants in the area.

Name: Benji's
Review Text: Loved this place. Really lovely interior, bright and open with plenty of seating. A bit of something for everyone on the menu, leaning more towards healthy dishes. Name: Benji's
Review Text:
Such a cozy place!

Name: Benji's
Review Text: This was a lovely find! The place is cosy with lots of plants, tables, chairs...it‚Äôs a good place to work as well because of free wifi and lots of plugs. I ordered a salmon teriyaki with avocados and it was good. Service was great too. Will definitely come back :)

Name: Benji's

Review Text: We visited benjis for a light lunch. I fell in love with the interior of the restaurant - natural light and a lot of plants. We both ordered wraps, I went for the tuna melt wrap (not light i know) and I was not disappointed. The food was amazing, the service was great and the place is nicely decorated. Would recommend.

Review Text:
